company_description: The Smart Admission System evaluates students holistically based on their competency profiles, academic performance, and learning portfolios to ensure fair and personalized admissions.
job_description: This applicant demonstrates strong academic foundations, proficiency in data tools, and a passion for independent learning—ideal for pursuing a data science-focused curriculum.
responsibilities: Participated in national and provincial academic competitions in STEM fields.
Built personal data projects using Python and data visualization tools.
Actively involved in academic clubs and peer knowledge sharing.
Authored personal essays and reflections showcasing learning growth.
Engaged in educational and social extracurricular activities.
Maintained consistent academic performance across subjects.
qualifications: Proficiency in Python, Power BI, and advanced Excel.
Strong analytical and presentation skills.
Demonstrated independent learning and research abilities.
Awards in math, informatics, and science competitions.
Personal learning projects or portfolios are a strong advantage.

finance: Referral scholarship for recommending talented peers
work_life_balance: Physical wellness and creative arts programs
Flexible academic paths based on competency
health: Access to study & wellbeing mobile apps

company_description: The Smart Admission System recognizes students with demonstrated ability to engage in real-world technology challenges using modern infrastructure tools and data frameworks.
job_description: This student applicant has a strong interest in cloud technologies and data engineering. Their portfolio includes structured data projects, collaborative research, and automation demos.
responsibilities: Built end-to-end data pipeline simulations using cloud platforms.
Led peer learning workshops on Python and ETL logic.
Created cloud project dashboards using Azure services.
Participated in school innovation fairs and STEM hackathons.
Explored emerging tools such as Apache Spark and Kafka.
Practiced documentation and version control in team settings.
qualifications: Strong grasp of Azure tools and data flows.
Built custom ETL logic for sample datasets.
Experience integrating APIs and cloud storage services.
Proficient in Python scripting and SQL queries.
Portfolio includes cloud automation or notebook-based projects.

learning: Workshops on cloud tools and DevOps basics
Intro to distributed computing and data modeling
health: Self-paced study with built-in wellness breaks

company_description: The Smart Admission Platform values students with a structured mindset and strong attention to detail, ideal for software validation and quality assurance domains.
job_description: This applicant has demonstrated critical thinking in test-driven learning projects, using automation tools and structured reporting for self-evaluation and peer reviews.
responsibilities: Created logic-based test cases for peer projects.
Simulated bug reporting via online testing tools.
Led QA roles in school-based software teams.
Documented test scenarios and reports independently.
Submitted reflection essays on problem analysis and solution breakdown.
qualifications: Familiarity with automated testing concepts.
Strong communication and logical sequencing.
Understanding of SDLC basics and common bugs.
Introductory experience with Java/Python scripts.
ISTQB Junior badge or online certification is a plus.

health: Support for eye and screen fatigue

position: Student Applicant – Business & Systems Thinking Track
company_description: The system seeks students who can think across systems, articulate goals clearly, and translate needs into solution logic. Ideal for future entrepreneurs and analysts.
job_description: This student shows potential in synthesizing problem spaces and communicating clear action steps. They are collaborative and oriented around user outcomes.
responsibilities: Mapped problem-solving frameworks in projects.
Wrote structured requirement documents for group work.
Assumed scrum facilitator roles in school projects.
Documented research findings to support proposals.
Aligned user needs with digital prototype ideas.
qualifications: Experience with group project organization.
Able to write user stories and feedback summaries.
Basic familiarity with agile thinking and timelines.
Effective communication across different roles.
Early exposure to product ideation or hackathons.

company_description: The competency-based program recognizes learners who thrive in systems thinking, automation, and building stable tech platforms to enable innovation.
job_description: This student has built or simulated technical pipelines, practiced automation, and demonstrated a system-oriented approach to solving operational challenges.
responsibilities: Set up simulated pipelines using GitHub Actions or scripts.
Used Terraform syntax in mock infrastructure assignments.
Deployed small-scale test environments with Docker.
Monitored metrics and logs for mini cloud deployments.
Documented system configurations with security in mind.
qualifications: Basic experience with cloud computing tools.
Hands-on practice in scripting (Python/Bash).
Strong awareness of system reliability concepts.
Good team collaboration in technical contexts.
Portfolio with DevOps tools or IaC is valued.

company_description: This admission profile reflects students who can build complete software products from backend to frontend, showing initiative and teamwork in digital innovation.
job_description: This student’s portfolio showcases working applications, strong design patterns, and collaborative development contributions with consistent learning growth.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented fullstack applications.
Contributed to collaborative school tech projects.
Applied version control using Git in group settings.
Followed agile-based workflows for school tech clubs.
Presented tech demos in local fairs or contests.
qualifications: Proficient in Java and ReactJS.
Understanding of backend database design (MongoDB, SQL).
Experience with CI/CD and REST principles.
Ability to work across full development lifecycle.
Portfolio link or GitHub activity available.

work_life_balance: Balance between solo and team work

company_description: This competency track welcomes early learners who show curiosity, creativity, and strong fundamentals in building user interfaces and interactive content.
job_description: This student is exploring frontend technologies, has built basic UI applications, and is keen on user experience, performance, and modern frameworks.
responsibilities: Developed frontend prototypes using ReactJS and CSS.
Practiced responsive design for multiple devices.
Explored Redux Toolkit for state handling.
Learned through project-based challenges.
Collaborated in beginner tech circles.
qualifications: Basic experience in modern web development.
Strong interest in UI/UX principles.
Learning-oriented and adaptive to tech changes.
Intro projects using JavaScript frameworks.
Willingness to learn from feedback and mentors.

position: Student Applicant – AI Engineering & Cloud Computing Track
company_description: The Smart Admission System evaluates students holistically based on competencies, portfolio projects, and technical growth. It recognizes practical experience in AI, system design, and scalable cloud applications.
job_description: This student showcases advanced programming, microservices architecture understanding, and a strong background in AI-related projects. Their hands-on experience with backend systems, data pipelines, and REST API development reflects high competency in engineering-oriented learning.
responsibilities: Developed full-stack and microservices-based applications in Java, Python, and Spring Boot.
Built face recognition and identity checking systems using YOLOv8, ArcFace, and Flask.
Implemented scalable backend systems using Docker, Kubernetes, and Helm.
Designed cloud-native pipelines with Kafka, Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD.
Built Android applications interacting with socket servers and MySQL databases.
Practiced MVC design, RESTful APIs, and secure system integration via Spring Security.
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Electronics (dual enrollment).
Certified Kubernetes Administrator (CKA), UX Design (Google), Data Science Specialization.
Hands-on experience with cloud infrastructure and DevOps pipelines.
Advanced knowledge in database systems, data warehousing, and ML concepts.
GitHub portfolio with production-level projects in AI and backend development.

finance: Merit-based scholarship for AI and Cloud competencies
Support for international competitions and conferences
learning: Capstone projects in AI and software engineering
health: Mindfulness and focus programs for deep learners
community: AI research circles and innovation hubs

hiring_manager: Nguyen Thanh Tam (Director of Engineering Admissions)

position: Student Applicant – Fullstack Web Development Track
company_description: The Smart Admission System identifies and supports learners with hands-on fullstack development experience, real-time systems, and strong UI/UX practices, enabling them to thrive in fast-paced academic technology environments.
job_description: This student has built multiple functional web systems such as an e-commerce platform and a social network clone. Their projects involve both frontend and backend logic, state management, real-time communication, and cloud integration.
responsibilities: Developed a Shopee-clone e-commerce site featuring authentication, profile, and cart systems.
Built a Discord-like social app with real-time messaging and video chat using Socket.IO and LiveKit.
Worked with state management libraries (Redux Toolkit, React Query) to structure data flow.
Customized CRM systems and IVR services in industry internship settings.
Integrated email APIs and chatbot-like communication into internal tools.
Practiced agile teamwork, participated in UI/UX enhancement and test automation.
qualifications: Bachelor of Information Technology from UIT – VNU HCM.
Frontend: ReactJS, NextJS, TailwindCSS, React Hook Form, React Query.
Backend: NodeJS (ExpressJS), ASP.NET, Flask (Python).
Database: MySQL, MongoDB, SQL Server.
Hands-on experience with GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket; strong understanding of REST APIs and real-time protocols.

finance: Referral bonus and peer mentoring rewards
health: Stress monitoring tools integrated in study platform

hiring_manager: Pham Minh Tu (Academic Fullstack Program Lead)
